fr.berger.enhancedlist.matrix

Class Matrix<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.berger.enhancedlist.matrix.Matrix<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of data
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Matrix<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The matrix class is a sort or 2-dimensional ArrayList. It can contains a table of m*n elements by using an ArrayList<ArrayList<T>>
    Author:
    Valentin Berger
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • init

        protected void init(int nbColumns,
                    int nbRows,
                    T defaultValue)
        Initialize the attributes and the matrix
        Parameters:
        nbColumns - The number of columns of the matrix
        nbRows - The number of rows of the matrix
        defaultValue - The default value to put in every cell of the matrix

      • get

        public T get(int x,
             int y)
        Get the element of the matrix contains in the cell (x ; y)
        Parameters:
        x - The column index
        y - The row index
        Returns:
        The element. If the coordinates are out of the grid, the result is null

      • get

        public T get(Point point)
        Get the element of the matrix contains in the cell (point.x ; point.y)
        Parameters:
        point - The coordinates of the cell to fetch
        Returns:
        The element. If the coordinates are out of the grid, the result is null

      • set

        public boolean set(int x,
                   int y,
                   T value)
        Set the value of the cell (x ; y) to value
        Parameters:
        x - The column index
        y - The row index
        value - The new value
        Returns:
        Return true if the method sets the cell to value, otherwise false

      • set

        public boolean set(Point point,
                   T value)
        Set the value of the cell (point.x ; point.y) to value
        Parameters:
        point - The coordinates of the cell to fetch
        value - The new value
        Returns:
        Return true if the method sets the cell to value, otherwise false

      • clear

        public void clear(T defaultValue)
        Clear the matrix by setting all cells to defaultValue
        Parameters:
        defaultValue - The value to apply to all cells

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clear the matrix by setting all cells to null

      • contains

        public boolean contains(T object)
        Search if the matrix contains object
        Parameters:
        object - The object to search in the matrix
        Returns:
        Return true if object is in the matrix, otherwise false

      • size

        public Point size()
        Return the size of the matrix
        Returns:
        Return a point such that the coordinate x is the number of columns, and y the number of rows.
